title: HOWBOUTDIS 18 inch Rainbow Playground Ball - Bouncy Durable Rubber - for Boys and Girls - Great Outdoor Fun - Perfect at The Beach, Park or Playground
features: OUTDOOR FUN: Encourage outdoor fun and exercise with this 18" rainbow playground ball. It is made of durable rubber that will withstand all the active play. The ball comes deflated and needs a pump to inflate. Pump not included.

PERFECT FOR: Going to the beach? Take it along. Heading to the park? Take it with you. Going to the playground? Bring it along for kicks. Hanging out in the yard? Start up a game of kickball with the neighbors.
GREAT GIFT: Need a birthday gift, holiday present? This ball will be remembered by the lucky recipient. Need a carnival prize or a cool party favor? This one is a winner!

GUARANTEED TO PLEASE: We take great pride in the toys and novelties that we provide for your family. If for any reason you are not totally satisfied with this playground ball, please let us know and will issue a full refund.
description: This 18" rainbow playground ball will provide hours of entertainment for your children. Encourage them to get outside and have some fun. Kicking and bouncing this ball will promote healthy activities that all children could use more of. It is made of extremely durable rubber and will last for a long time.
